description: Demo workspace showcasing job scheduling functionality

jobs.name: backup-data
jobs.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Starting backup at $(date)"
mkdir -p /tmp/backups
echo "Backup data: $(date)" > /tmp/backups/backup-$(date +%Y%m%d).txt
echo "Backup completed at $(date)"

jobs.name: cleanup-logs
jobs.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Cleaning up old logs..."
find /tmp -name '*.log' -mtime +7 -delete
echo "Log cleanup completed"

jobs.name: custom-task
jobs.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Custom task running at $(date)"
echo "WORKSPACE_ID: $WORKSPACE_ID"
echo "JOB_NAME: $JOB_NAME"
echo "WORKSPACE_DEPLOYMENT_DIR: $WORKSPACE_DEPLOYMENT_DIR"
jobs.description: Frequent custom task with environment variables
